health.title: Why do you work with health and wellness businesses, specifically?
health.description: 15 years deep into our professional journey, we're acutely aware of how easy it is to slip into an unhealthy lifestyle when you're busy. And, frankly, that story is all too common for people the world over. There are some incredible health and wellness companies out there making real change to people's lives, and we love the idea of dialling our focus into supporting those who are driving that change. We're also firm believers that happy, healthy people create better businesses.

health.title: What does a completed set of research include?
health.description: EVERYTHING you need to write (or have us write) compelling content that your target audience is currently searching for every day. That includes everything from an optmized title, to the key phrases you'll need to incorporate, to example sites that are ranking well in the same space, to specific guidance on how best to tailor the piece. We'll even include suggestions on how to position any relevant CTAs.

csc.title: Who is this for?
csc.description: Sign companies who appreciate owning their own content, want to optimize their efforts, and are looking to reduce their ad spend.*
